tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_financing_instrument CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_financing_instrument AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, val.category_value, f.financing_instr_category_value AS id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_category_value val ON f.financing_instr_category_value = val.id UNION SELECT eu.amp_activity_id, val.category_value, eu_con.financing_instr_category_value AS id FROM amp_eu_activity eu JOIN amp_eu_activity_contributions eu_con ON eu_con.eu_activity_id = eu.id JOIN amp_category_value val ON eu_con.financing_instr_category_value = val.id;
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_credit_donation CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_credit_donation AS SELECT v.amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN v.category_value = 'Donacion' THEN 'Donacion' ELSE 'Credito' END AS name, CASE WHEN v.category_value = 'Donacion' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS id FROM v_financing_instrument v;
